get.summary: Get document using the document id.
get.description:
This API returns a document object associated with the requestor
for an request to get meta data as application/json.
This API endpoint also can be configured to return a binary stream if the
response needed is for an application/pdf or image/*.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: unique document identifier to retrieve the associated document.

parameters.name: member_number
parameters.description:
member number to retrieve associated id card. This is only applicable
when a member is requesting an ID Card for other members on the plan i.e.
spouse, dependents. Multiple member numbers can be supported as member_number=1&member_number=2&member_number=3
as an example.

parameters.name: member_coverage_id
parameters.description:
Member Coverage ID identifying document for a specific Member's
coverage type i.e. Medical, Dental etc. This is mainly only applicable if
a document such as an ID Card is to be downloaded for a specific member
and a specific product type.

parameters.name: effective_date
parameters.description:
effective date of the document. Usually only applies to downloading
ID Cards for current benefit period or future benefit period.

parameters.name: termination_date
parameters.description:
termination date of the document. Usually only applies to downloading
ID Cards for current benefit period or future benefit period.

200.description: provides the Document object associated with the document id.
